SELECT METHOD_NM AS conectMethod , COALESCE(SUM(CREAT_CO),0) AS creatCo , COALESCE(SUM(UPDT_CO),0) AS updtCo , COALESCE(SUM(RDCNT),0) AS inqireCo , COALESCE(SUM(DELETE_CO),0) AS deleteCo , COALESCE(SUM(OUTPT_CO),0) AS outptCo , COALESCE(SUM(ERROR_CO),0) AS errorCo
, SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(OCCRRNC_DE, 7, 2)) AS statsDate
, 0 AS statsCo FROM COMTSSYSLOGSUMMARY WHERE OCCRRNC_DE BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}
AND SVC_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{detailStatsKind}),'%')
GROUP BY conectMethod, statsDate, statsCo ORDER BY statsDate

SELECT COUNT(CONECT_ID) AS statsCo
, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 1, 4) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 5, 2)) AS statsDate
, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 1, 4), '-'), SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 5, 2)), '-'), SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd'), 7, 2)) AS statsDate
, '' AS conectMethod , 0 AS creatCo , 0 AS updtCo , 0 AS inqireCo , 0 AS deleteCo , 0 AS outptCo , 0 AS errorCo FROM COMTNLOGINLOG WHERE CONECT_ID = #{detailStatsKind}
AND TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT, 'YYYYmmdd') BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} GROUP BY statsDate, conectMethod, creatCo, updtCo, inqireCo, deleteCo, outptCo, errorCo ORDER BY statsDate
